name: Rinascita Echo Fiesta
description: Rinascita Echo Fiesta is a card-collecting web event that will task players to collect as many Rinascita echo cards as possible to get rewards like Astrites, enhancement materials, and a Malleable Elite Class Echo item for Version 2.0!

name: Ascendant Aces
description: Ascendant Aces is Wuthering Waves' character trial run event. At the time of writing, you can try out Carlotta, Zhezhi, Sanhua, Chixia, Mortefi in a closed arena with enemies to defeat.

name: Gifts of Joyous Tunes
description: Gifts of Joyous Tunes is a Log-in event where players may claim Lustrous Tides or Radiant Tides for every day that they log into the game until the end of the event's duration.

name: Traces of Tides
description: Traces of Tides is a Photo Collection Event. You must explore Rinascita and take a photo of its mesmerizing sceneries and memorable moments!

name: Pincer Maneuver Warriors
description: Pincer Maneuver Warriors is a combat event where players have two teams to fight multiple waves of enemies with the help of unique buffs. Rewards for this event include Astrites, leveling materials, and more!
duration: Part III : January 2, 2025 - January 23, 2025 Part IV : January 23, 2025 - February 12, 2025

name: Although Colors Have No Form
description: Although Colors Have No Form is a Co-Op event where you have to investigate areas and fight multiple waves of enemies to save Claudia from her nightmares. There are Trial Resonators you could use and Support Echoes you can equip to strengthen your team!

name: Stage in the Box and Thawborn Renewal
description: Banners for Version 2.0 has been announced, with the new character Roccia coming in Phase 2 alongside the rerun of Jinhsi!

name: Absolute Pulsation (Tragicomedy) and Absolute Pulsation (Ages of Harvest)
description: The signature weapons of the rate-up 5-star characters will also run alongside their banners with Roccia's new 5-star weapon, Tragicomedy, coming in Version 2.0's second phase!
